workflow.meta: 持续督导半年报核查报告审批流程

function.name: abs.ExecSQL
function.arg: ["UPDATE ECIF.tIB_DTTX SET TXZT = 0 WHERE PN1 = {0} AND BZLX = 20",[{"expression":"O_WORKFLOW.XMMC","scale":"","length":"","type":"1"}]]

function.name: abs.ExecSQL
function.arg: ["UPDATE ECIF.TIB_KHXX SET GPDM = {0} WHERE ID = (SELECT SSKH FROM ECIF.TIB_XMXX WHERE ID = {1})",[{"expression":"O_WORKFLOW.GPDM","length":"","scale":"","type":"0"},{"expression":"O_WORKFLOW.XMMC","length":"","scale":"","type":"1"}]]

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  yjbmid = ABS_SQLVALUE("select id  from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 start with id= ? connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQBM]);
var  cnt2 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where id = ? and sfdlbm =1",[yjbmid]);
cnt2 > 0

step.name: 投资银行总部文管审批
投资银行总部职能审批
投资银行总部总经理审批

dynOwner.expression:
["instr(',' ||
 (select owner
 from (select owner
 from jgcrm.os_historystep
 where step_id = 32
 and action_id = 33
 and entry_id = (select instid
 from ecif.lcIB_CXDDBNBHCBG
 where id = {0})
 order by finish_date asc)
 where rownum = 1) || ',',
 ',' || id || ',') > 0 or instr(',' ||
 (select owner
 from (select owner
 from jgcrm.os_historystep
 where step_id = 32
 and action_id <0
 and entry_id = (select instid
 from ecif.lcIB_CXDDBNBHCBG
 where id = {0})
 order by finish_date asc)
 where rownum = 1) || ',',
 ',' || id || ',') > 0 ",[{"expression":"O_WORKFLOW.ID","length":0,"scale":0,"type":0}]]

step.name: 项目组部门总经理审核

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  yjbmid = ABS_SQLVALUE("select id  from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 start with id= ? connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQBM]);
var  cnt2 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where id = ? and sfdlbm =1",[yjbmid]);
cnt2 > 0

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var a=ABS_LOADBEAN("com.apex.bss.mod.gdzqWorkflowWebservice.workflowSamples.InternalDocumentsJavabean");
var oaid=a.creatNewWorkFlow("lcIB_CXDDBNBHCBG",O_WORKFLOW.ID,O_WORKFLOW.XMMC.ID,$Login.User,'100000');
var ret = LB_sqlProcedure("{call ecif.pro_ib_oaresulthandle(:ral{int},:ret,?,?,?,?)}",[oaid,O_WORKFLOW.ID,"lcIB_CXDDBNBHCBG",$Login.User]); 
ABS_SETRETNOTE(ret.get('ret'));
if(ret.get('ral')>0){
  true;
}else{
  false;
}

function.name: lb.Assert
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var status=ABS_SQLVALUE("select max(status) from ECIF.tib_oawfhandle where upper(lcbd)=upper('lcIB_CXDDBNBHCBG') and lcbdid=?",[O_WORKFLOW.ID]);
status==1

step.name: 项目组部门总经理审核

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var s=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.OS_CURRENTSTEP T,JGCRM.LBWFCURRENTOWNER A WHERE T.ID = A.STEPID AND T.ENTRY_ID = ? AND T.STEP_ID = 125 AND A.OWNER = ?",[O_WORKFLOW.InstID,$Login.User]);
if (s>0){
LB_workAction("lcIB_CXDDBNBHCBG",O_WORKFLOW.ID,126,"");
ABS_flushObjCache('WORKFLOW.TASK')
}

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:

cnt1 == 0
